source_objects.title: Human Resources
source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: Be Ready for the Crazy, Chaotic World of Trying to Get Hired
items.headline: A sneak peak into the Job Search Solution
objectives_summary: Understanding what expectations you should have during a job interview
How to control your response to hiring authorities conducting interviews
This tutorial teaches the candidate and how they deal with these biases.

items.title: Captivating Cultural Intelligence
items.headline: CQ for Business & Development
objectives_summary: 10 cultural potpourris around the world
Selected cultural terminologies
Individualism and collectivism cultures

items.title: Become a Corporate Receptionist
items.headline: Master the corporate skills of a Receptionist & Office Admin and develop a career as a professional receptionist.
objectives_summary: Get introductory idea on Reception and Receptionist
Understand necessary skills and your responsibilities as a Receptionist
Gain a greater understanding of record keeping and filing systems

items.title: Managing in Multi-Generational Workplace: Managing Diversity

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course explores how generational diversity should affect you as a leader.
objectives_summary: Identify the management preferences of members of each generational cohort..
Explore strategies used to capitalize on the differences that a multi-generational workforce has to offer.
Discover a tool that can be used to better understand issues that will arise when you are faced with generational diversity, The Generational Management Decision Tree.

items.title: Performance Management for Human Resources Professionals

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: The course examines how HR professionals can create true differentiation while bringing unique value to corporate table.
objectives_summary: Discover employee driven performance planning, check-in, and review concepts.
Explore what coaching employees to drive their own performance looks like.
Recognize how to connect employees top performance areas to organizational needs.

items.title: Human Resources and Strategic Planning (HRCI - PHR/SPHR)
items.headline: Course 4 of 20 of The Human Resources Certification Program (HRCI - PHR/SPHR)
objectives_summary: Strategic Planning Process and the Role of HR
Organizational Life Cycle and Structure
Cost-benefit Analysis and Life Cycle Planning

items.title: Competency-based Interviewing Done Right (Incl. 1 SHRM PDC)

visible_instructors.title: Nahed Khairallah
visible_instructors.name: Nahed
visible_instructors.job_title: Head of HR Consulting at Omcore Consulting

items.headline: Techniques that are guaranteed to improve your quality of hires
objectives_summary: The components of a recruitment process
The different types of interviews
What are competencies and how they are represented within an organization

items.title: BCABA Board Certified Assistant Behavior Analyst exams
items.headline: Pass the BCABA certification on the first attempt. 160 questions
objectives_summary: BCaBAs must have coursework in ethics and professional conduct as part of the eligibility requirements for the certification. In addition, each BCaBA must abide by the Professional and Ethical Compliance Code for Behavior Analysts.

items.title: Overcoming Biases in Diverse and Inclusive Environments
items.headline: Improve the quality of relationships by increasing awareness of how our biases shape what we see in others
objectives_summary: Apply the “Trust Gauge” analogy to better understand how trust builds and erodes
Understand how verbal, visual, and contextual cues layer together to signal trustworthiness
Advance our understanding of what it means to trust wisely.

items.title: Expert tips for Job Interview Success
items.headline: Slides Only Quick Bites
objectives_summary: Expert tips for Job Interview Success
How to answer different types of questions
How to prepare for Interviews

items.title: Performance Management for Managers
items.headline: Creating and Maintaining a Winning Team
objectives_summary: You will know what your role is in the performance management process
You will know how to create value for your organisation
You will know how to create a high performing and productive team which is valued in the organisation

items.title: Special Corporate Etiquette
items.headline: Employer etiquette. employee etiquette, office party etiquette, internet and email etiquette, office lunch etiquette etc
objectives_summary: Understand the introduction of etiquettes
Learn corporate etiquette - Do's and Don'ts
Learn interview etiquette

items.title: Action Mapping Method for Business Trainers

visible_instructors.title: Shanath Kumar
visible_instructors.name: Shanath
visible_instructors.job_title: Principal Consultant, Learn To Learn Academy

items.headline: Design actions to achieve training goals
objectives_summary: Using Action Mapping Technique to address Performance  and Learning Issues
Adopt Action Mapping as an Instructional Design method to address focused Business Issues
Use Action Mapping as an effective training strategy solve real issues

items.title: Employee Training (HRCI -PHR/SPHR)
items.headline: Course 11 of 20 of The Human Resources Certification Program (HRCI - PHR/SPHR)
objectives_summary: Assessing an Organization's Training Needs
Training Program Development Techniques
Implement and Facilitate Employee Training Programs

items.title: Masterclass IV: The Code on Social Security 2020
items.headline: Lectures on Indian Labour Codes- The Code on Social Security 2020
objectives_summary: Know the need of Labour Laws in Business
Know the key concepts, understand logic of the statutes
Create a list of activities that you need to execute at your workplace
